Comments_List: This course does a good job teaching both the conceptual and mathematical sides of chemistry.
Strength: very well taught. Weakness: not giving enough room for questions.
Yes, I would. I have taken Chemistry multiple times, and I think this was probably the best time I learned it. It has to do with the professor and the great homework assignments.
For any student interested in taking general chemistry or required to take it, I would highly recommend taking this summer course instead of a full year course.
yes! a great condensed way to learn much information in little time
